goal.ch: 本課程原名「影像分析與寫作」，本年度課程著重媒體與戲劇的分析與創意寫作，立意以「媒體藝術」與「表演藝術」作為應用人文與社會實踐的教學策略，透過業界專業師資的引進，引導學生在藝術創作的實踐中，學習人文運用的技巧以及社會實踐的意義。
goal.en: This is the 1st half of freshman writing course that uses media and visual materials (ex. theatre and film) to stimulate students’ interest and engagement in writing. Ultimately, this course functions as a workshop focusing on the skills of creative writings for drama ＆ screen.

outline.ch:
本課程內容採工作坊形式，在三部分五段式教學中，按部就班引導學生瞭解並學習舞台劇獨幕劇與電影短片寫作的技巧，學生將在本學期中完成英文劇本3篇，並透過讀劇與全班分享。第一部分自第一至三段至，重點在於劇本寫組基本概念與練習，同學將透過經典閱讀認識戲劇結構與分景、空間與場景、對白與潛臺詞、角色人物等主要元素。第一部分的三階段課程結束前，同學將完成第一篇英文短劇寫作，長度以十分鐘為限。第四段教學將進入劇場空間，
第二部分以及四階段教學，將以改編為主軸，教學拉到劇場空間，運用劇場身體遊戲，建立學生對於戲劇結構、角色人物建立乃至人物與各類空間的關係，繼續進行劇本寫作練習。第二部分同樣以一個短劇寫作和讀劇作為終點。第三部分除了繼續以劇場空間為教學場域，主題則改以短片劇本書寫為主，介紹同學在集體合作之下，完成自己的劇本寫作，並以一個短片劇本為終結。
本課程同時有兩次課外欣賞活動，修課者必須出席。本課程開放全校選修，歡迎具備寫作基礎的同學修課。同時，每堂課皆有指定閱讀以及／或者指定寫作練習，修課同學應留意時間安排，準時完成作業。
outline.en:
The first part of course contains three sections, focusing on learning from dramatic classics, practicing with basic skills about creation from various spaces, dramatic elements of conflict, action and motivation. To end this part of practice, students are to write and present a 10-mins short script for the stage.
The second part of this class will move on to NCU’s black-box theatre, where students will learn via some theatrical games to build the skills about characterizations, motivations, and dramatic structure about beat, event, and action. The second part of the class introduces to students the idea of adaptation, and the focus of writings for this part is about adaptation. To wrap up this section, students are to write a 10-mins adapted short play for stage and present again it to the class via readings.
The last part of the class moves to creative writing for screen. Group collaboration will be introduced and students will continue and practice on further writing skills. A short screen script is to be written and presented via designated ways.
Throughout the whole semester, two fieldtrips will be arranged and are required for all. Also, students should complete pre-assigned readings and writings on time.

5.The Screenwrite’s Workbook (Syd Field).
